references.paper_title: Multimodal prompt perceiver: Empower adaptiveness, generalizability and fidelity for all-in-one image restoration
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant because it also focuses on all-in-one image restoration, a key topic of the current paper.

references.paper_title: All-in-one image restoration for unknown corruption
references.reason: This is a foundational paper for all-in-one image restoration techniques, directly impacting the methods used in the current paper.

references.paper_title: PromptIR: Prompting for all-in-one image restoration
references.reason: This paper proposes a novel prompt-based method for all-in-one image restoration, providing a relevant comparison for the current work.
This paper established simple yet effective baselines for image restoration, which are used for comparison in evaluating the results of the current paper.

references.paper_title: SwinIR: Image restoration using Swin Transformer
references.reason: This work introduced the Swin Transformer architecture for image restoration, a highly influential model that is benchmarked against in the current study.
